title: Algerian roast chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole 1.5kg chicken', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 small glass water']
